description.name: virtupolygon
description.tagline: Virtucoin polygon Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto polygon-virtu Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Virtucoin polygon directly on your website
Unique polygon/virtu receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your polygon/virtu wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
